snippet: Parker Posey will host the Sundance Film Festival Awards, and a jury for the festival is unveiled.
abstract: Parker Posey will host the Sundance Film Festival Awards, and a jury for the festival is unveiled.
lead_paragraph: Once an Indie Queen always an Indie Queen? Yes - if you're Parker Posey, who has been in more than a dozen Sundance films over the years, including "Party Girl" and "The House of Yes." On Tuesday the festival announced that she will host the 2012 Sundance Film Festival Awards on Jan. 28. Ms. Posey, 43, also stars as a cuckoo from cuckoo-ville boss in "Price Check," a comic drama that will have its premiere at the festival. Sundance on Tuesday also announced its roster of jurors. The full list, which includes names like the director Justin Lin ("Better Luck Tomorrow," "Fast Five") and Charles Ferguson (the director/producer of the Oscar-winning documentary "Inside Job"), can be found here.
